text: Harry Francis Smith (born August 2, 1985) is a Canadian professional wrestler of English descent who currently works for Major League Wrestling under the name Davey Boy Smith, Jr.. He also worked for World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) and New Japan Pro-Wrestling (NJPW). Smith has wrestled on WWE's Raw brand and in Florida Championship Wrestling under the name DH Smith ("D" for Davey Boy Smith, and "H" for the Hart family). Later he performed on the ECW brand using the name David Hart Smith, as a member of The Hart Dynasty, alongside Tyson Kidd and Natalya. He and Kidd are one-time Unified WWE Tag Team Champions and the last holders of the original World Tag Team Championship. On August 5, 2011, WWE released Smith from his wrestling contract. His grandfather is Stu Hart who was a wrestling promoter. His father was Davey Boy Smith. His first public wrestling match was at age 10. He started wrestling professionally on February 22, 2002 at age 16 and has been continuing since then. ==In wrestling== *Finishing moves **Camel clutch — 2007–2008 **Running powerslam — 2007-present **Saito suplex — 2008-present **Sharpshooter — 2010-present *Signature moves **Arm drag **Big boot **Bulldog Bite (Standing or seated dragon sleeper) **Brainbuster **Elevated Boston crab **Guillotine leg drop **Jackhammer **Multiple suplex variations ***Back ***Delayed vertical, sometimes from the second rope ***German ***Northern Lights ***Triple belly-to-belly **Powerbomb **Scoop powerslam *With TJ Wilson/Tyson Kidd **Hart Attack *Managers **Diana Hart **Nattie Neidhart / Natalya **Bret Hart *Nicknames **"The Canadian Bulldog" **"Bulldog" ==Championships and accomplishments== ===Professional
